name: Lab Rat - BULLET HELL JAM!
description:
Left click -> Moves your character

Right click -> Teleports

Keyboard 1 -> Casts FrozenOrb (1 sec cooldown, damage multiple enemies)

Keyboard 2 -> Casts FireBall (single target damage, no cooldown)

Keyboard 3 -> Shield preventing any damage taken for 2 seconds

Q and W -> Health and Mana potion (5 seconds cooldown)
